heading: New Maxroll Ad-Free Feature â€“ Pinned Pages!
content: With a lot of excitement around the games we cover, our developers have been hard at work to bring the new feature to the ! This feature lets you pin article, guide, etc. from branch across to your own profile. This will allow you to clean up your bookmarks and get a little more out of your subscription from us, which we genuinely appreciate. The best part, it is active right now! To get to your Pinned Pages, simply open the left sidebar menu, and click on This is really easy to do. At the top of any guide, you will now see a button. Hit it and just like that, the page is saved! Just go to your and click on the trash can icon, in the upper right of any page you liked to remove. We hope you like this addition and can get a lot of use out of it. We are always looking for more features to add to the and are open to suggestions from you! If you haven't already, head over to our and tell us what would make your experience even better. Also, don't forget to use the channel if you encounter an issue.
